SENT.plain: Erythroid and myeloid colonies were grown from the bone marrow of 81 patients with myelodysplasia and the median number of colonies correlated with the FAB classification and Bournemouth score
CFU-GM were increased in CMML compared to RAEB and RAEBt
BFU-E were higher in RA than in the other FAB subgroups
Patients with a high Bournemouth score had poorer CFU-GM and BFU-E growth than those with a low score
